alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 2:47PM AKST until January 24 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE THROUGH TUESDAY... .Snowfall continues across portions of the northern panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain or mix as warmer air continues to inch northward Tuesday evening. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has become wetter but temperatures have remained cold enough to stay as snow. Precipitation rates will significantly diminish beginning Wednesday morning followed by a break through Thursday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
